channel.title: [REQUEST]Banner For Forum
channel.description: Hi there, i was just looking for a gfxer to make me a banner for my forums.. my forums are www.AngelzOfDeath.com i dont know how big or anything but id like to have something goth i dont really know :S just a banner that will match the site and has Angelz Of Death on it contact me at angelzofdeath@live.com i will pay paypal for it if necessary.,.

item.title: [REQUEST]Banner For Forum
item.dc:creator: @elitepvper elitepvper
item.description:
@elitepvper wrote:

good idea[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2009, 05:17:29 am[/size][hr]

Here’s your image but you’ll have to pay me to get the sample things off. Its 3 pounds total. If you don’t like it like that, I can make you a gif image like this one.

BTW- I made the AmmarScape one myself so you can’t blame me for leeching. If you don’t believe me you can ask ammar himself.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST]Banner For Forum
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

elitepvper:

I have a logo for you. I just don’t know how i can show it to you without you paying me. If you pay me 1 pound first ill show you the picture and then you can pay me the rest on paypal. PM me if you want the banner. ;D

Or you could just put those sample tags all over the image, then show it to him?

Read full topic
